i.name: Battle Fury
i.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

q.name: Bloodlust
q.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

w.name: Mocking Shout
w.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.

e.name: Spinning Slash
e.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

r.name: Undying Rage
r.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

i1.blurb: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.
description: {{sbc|Fury:}} '''Tryndamere''' gains 5 {{tip|fury}} each time he lands a [[basic attack]], and 10 {{tip|fury}} on {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} and each time he kills an enemy. After not dealing or receiving damage for 8 seconds, '''Tryndamere''' loses 5 {{tip|fury}} per second.

{{sbc|Battle Fury:}} '''Tryndamere''' gains {{as|{{pp|4|changedisplay=true|key=%|0.35 to 0.5|1;6;11;16}} critical strike chance}} per point of [[File:Fury_resource.png|20px|link=Manaless#Fury]] [[Manaless#Fury|fury]], up to a maximum of {{as|{{pp|4|changedisplay=true|key=%|35 to 50|1;6;11;16}} critical strike chance}}.
i1.name: Battle Fury
notes: * Attacks against structures will not grant bonus '''Fury''', but will still reset the timer on '''Fury''' decay.

riot.name: Battle Fury
riot.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

q1.blurb: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Tryndamere''' permanently has {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}, and gains additional {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} per {{as|{{sti|health|1% of his '''missing''' health}}}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Tryndamere''' consumes all of his {{tip|fury}} and [[healing|heals]] himself, increased for every point of {{tip|fury}} consumed.
leveling: {{st|Bonus AD|{{as|{{ap|5 to 25}} AD}}|Bonus AD Per Missing Health|{{as|{{ap|0.15 to 0.35}} AD}}|Maximum Bonus AD|{{as|{{ap|5+0.15*100 to 25+0.35*100}} AD}}}}
q1.name: Bloodlust
notes: * ''Bloodlust'' has no cast time and does not interrupt Tryndamere's previous orders.
* ''Bloodlust'' can still be activated if Tryndamere does not have any '''Fury'''.

riot.name: Bloodlust
riot.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

w1.blurb: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tryndamere''' reduces the {{as|attack damage}} of all nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
Targets who have their backs turned to him are also {{tip|slow|slowed}} for the duration.
w1.name: Mocking Shout
notes: *''Mocking Shout'' cannot be activated unless an enemy is within range of Tryndamere. Due to this, it is possible to use the ability to scout in the [[sight|Fog of War]] and provide pseudo [[stealth]] detection of enemy champions.
*''Mocking Shout'' will briefly provide sight of Tryndamere if he uses it in the [[sight|Fog of War]].

riot.name: Mocking Shout
riot.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
riot.tooltip: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

e1.blurb: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tryndamere''' {{tip|dashes}} to a target location, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to enemies in his path and gaining 2 {{tip|fury}} per enemy hit.
''Spinning Slash's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second whenever '''Tryndamere''' {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}}, increased to 2 seconds against enemy champions.
e1.name: Spinning Slash
notes: * The cooldown reduction on crit is doubled with a phantom hit from {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.

riot.name: Spinning Slash
riot.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
riot.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by {{ e2 }} second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This reduction is increased to {{ e3 }} seconds against champions.

r1.blurb: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Tryndamere''' instantly gains {{tip|fury}} and becomes immune to [[death]] for 5 seconds, during which his health cannot fall below a certain amount.
''Undying Rage'' can be used even when affected by [[crowd control]].
r1.name: Undying Rage
notes: *''Undying Rage'' has no cast time and does not interrupt Tryndamere's previous orders.

* Drain-type effects such as [[life steal]] and [[spell vamp]] are applied '''before''' the damage reduction of ''Undying Rage'' takes place. As such, these attacks will heal as if the full damage was dealt, despite being unable to bring Tryndamere below {{pp|3|30|50|70|1|2|3|type=''Undying Rage'' level}} health.
*''Undying Rage'' has no effect against the [[Nexus Obelisk]].

riot.name: Undying Rage
riot.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
riot.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.
